title: Hard Choice (4U123)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot Aragorn to heal a companion who has the Aragorn signet twice.
Lore:	”'Shall we rest by night, or shall we go on while our will and strength hold?'”
Rarity:	U
